output_list.impact: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
freezeAccount function allows the owner to freeze the account of any user, which removes their assets.
setPrices function is public, allowing unauthorized users to change the sell and buy prices.
Integer overflow in buy function allows the owner to set the balance of the buyer to any value.
Integer overflow in sell function allows the owner to set the balance of the seller to any value.
transferFrom function is public, allowing unauthorized users to change the balance of the seller.
transfer function is public, allowing unauthorized users to change the balance of the buyer.
payWinner function is public, allowing unauthorized users to change the balance of the winner.
